name: @ngblaylock/bootstrap-extensions
description: Commonly used code to extend or modify Bootstrap 5

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run sass:dist:build && npm run sass:eleventy:build && npx @11ty/eleventy --pathprefix=bootstrap-extensions
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run sass:dist:watch & npm run sass:eleventy:watch & npx @11ty/eleventy --serve & npm run sass:eleventy:watch

author: ngblaylock
